biotools.summary: Regvar is a deep neural network-based computational server for prioritizing tissue-specific noncoding regulatory variants. RegVar integrates the sequential, epigenetic and evolutionary profiles of single nucleotide polymorphisms (SNPs) and their potential target genes in 17 human tissues, and gives tissue-specific predictions of regulatory probabilities of the provided SNPs on provided genes.
